    Function reference

    All functions

    arima_mu()
    Capture arima.mu from x13 output
    corona_outliers() update_spec_corona_outliers()
    Corona outliers
    crit_ok()
    PICKMDL "first" check
    crit_selection()
    Selection from table of PICKMDL criteria
    crit_table() crit123_m_aic() crit1() crit2() crit3() m_aic()
    Table of PICKMDL criteria
    filter_input()
    x13 output filters to x13 input filters
    konstruksjon()
    Lage faktorer for kalendereffekter
    ok()
    PICKMDL information as a list
    pickmdl_data()
    Function that returns an r object with data
    text_frame_apply()
    Apply function(s) with input from a data frame
    update_spec_outliers() update_outliers()
    Update x13 spec with outliers
    x13_both()
    x13_spec and x13_pickmdl wrapped as a single function
    x13_multi()
    Multiple x13 runs from multiple specifications
    x13_pickmdl() x13_automdl()
    x13 with PICKMDL and partial concurrent possibilities
    x13_spec_pickmdl()
    Multiple X-13ARIMA model specifications
    x13_text_frame()
    Multiple x13_both runs with code input from a data frame
